name: Creepy Mansion (Pedro FP)
description:
You has distributed your pc's ip to play online, but, a guys has touched at you door, you opened the door, and they kidnapped you, until you wake up, you see that you are in the old mansion of Jack Buckler, that mansion has been there since 60's and the rumors says than that house is....  enchanted....

now, try to get out of there else somebody will catch you!

If you have more questions, see README's file, questions such as Controls, System Requeriments, Changelog, etc...
